attributes.action: Make PSHCE more prominent in the primary school curriculum.
attributes.background: PSHCE stands for Personal, Social, Health and citizenship Education. Everyone needs to learn the basic life skills such as cooking, cleaning, respect and self care. In my opinion, respect and self care are the most important to learn at a young age.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. In particular we aren't sure what you mean by "more prominent". Schools are already legally obliged to make provision for PSHCE. We aren't sure what further action you would like the Government or Parliament to take.

You could start an new petition setting out clearly what you would like to happen.
